topic.title: Chief Complaint Section Proc Note - conformance rules

section.p: The Chief Complaint section records the patient's chief complaint (the patient's own description). The Chief Complaint section may be a subsection of the Medical History section.

ol.li: SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "10154-3" CHIEF COMPLAINT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC) (CONF-PN-108)
MAY satisfy: If the Chief Complaint section is NOT present, there MAY be a statement in the Medical History section providing the patient's chief compliant. (CONF-PN-109)
[CDT] SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "10154-3" CHIEF COMPLAINT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC) (CONF-PN-108)
[CDT] MAY satisfy: If the Chief Complaint section is NOT present, there MAY be a statement in the Medical History section providing the patient's chief compliant. (CONF-PN-109)
